job.title: DevOps Engineer
job.description: <p>This position will be responsible for helping with the teams move to automation. This will include both Infrastructure as Code and SecDevOps.</p><p><br></p><p>This individual will be responsible for maintaining existing code, creating new automation and corresponding documentation.</p><p><br></p><p>The position will focus Application Delivery Networking, which includes Load Balancing, Smart DNS and Security Offerings.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Required Qualifications</strong></p><p><br></p><ul><li>2+ years of development and maintenance experience in Ansible OR Tower.</li><li>2+ years of development and maintenance experience in Git.</li><li>2+ years of development and maintenance experience in REST Interfaces.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Preferred Qualifications</strong></p><p><br></p><ul><li>It would be nice if the candidate had experience with Load Balancing, Networking or Private Key Infrastructure.</li><li>Experience in:</li><li>Cloud platform experience: AWS/AZURE/GCP</li><li>Declarative Onboarding using AS3</li><li>Database Experience</li><li>Octopus</li><li>Bash</li><li>VSCode\Python\PHP</li><li>Node.js</li><li>React.js</li><li>SNOW</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Education</strong></p><p><br></p><ul><li>A degree in information technology or matching job experience.</li></ul>
